0.text: Innate: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed and  life steal based on his missing health, up to 60% − 100% (based on level) bonus attack speed and 8% − 25% (based on level) life steal at 70% missing health.

Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location that deals physical damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds. Enemy  champions hit are also inflicted with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

1.text: Olaf grants  ghosting to  monsters that are hit or nearby when Undertow is cast for 6 seconds.

2.text: The axe remains in place for a duration equal to Undertow's cooldown, briefly granting  sight of its surroundings. Olaf can pick up the axe to reduce Undertow's  total cooldown to 2.5 seconds, which  resets the cooldown if that has already elapsed.

3.text: Undertow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and a  shield for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% missing health.

1.text: Tough It Out  resets Olaf's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Olaf strikes thunder onto the target enemy, dealing  true damage. If this kills the target, Olaf  heals for the  health cost.

1.text: Basic attacks  reduce Reckless Swing's cooldown by 1 second.

0.text: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

1.text: Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 3 seconds,  cleansing himself of all  crowd control and becoming  immune to them, as well as gaining  bonus attack damage and 10% increased size. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed while moving towards  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.

2.text: Ragnarok's duration is increased by and up to 2.5 seconds for each basic attack  on-hit or cast of  Reckless Swing against an enemy  champion.

Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+30% attack speed
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Threefold Strike: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks decay once every 0.5 seconds after the duration ends.
Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3 bonus attack damage, 3 ability haste, and 3 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THREEFOLD STRIKE: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks decay once every 0.5 seconds after the duration ends.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • tons of damage
  • 3333

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – The Claws that Catch: Gain 45% base AD as bonus attack damage.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, gain a shield equal to 75% of bonus health that decays over 3.75 seconds (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THE CLAWS THAT CATCH: Gain 45% base AD as bonus attack damage.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

0.concerningText: Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location that deals physical damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds. Enemy  champions hit are also inflicted with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location that deals physical damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds. Enemy  champions hit are also inflicted with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.
Active: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and a  shield for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% missing health.
Active: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and a  shield for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% missing health.
Active: Olaf strikes thunder onto the target enemy, dealing  true damage. If this kills the target, Olaf  heals for the  health cost.
Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
